name: Hail The Fallen Third
description:
This is a continuation to "The Fallen Third" and "The Host." Caitlyn and her friend Jacob investigate the old Church to uncover the EVIL that has been lurking. She later finds herself dealing with more than she had anticipated.

Press escape to get to settings.

MOVE - WASD

USE/ACTION - R or L MOUSE BUTTON

CAMER ZOOM - PRESS MID MOUSE WHEEL

CROUCH - CTRL

RUN - SHIFT 

MENU - ESC

INVERTORY - TAB 

CORNER PEAK - Q or E

GUN - G

RELOAD - R

Equip Unequip - ROLL MOUSE WHEEL
